dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, I heard the Pentagon spent like, a ton of money on, uh, a gold statue of the former President, like, Donald Trump, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, I heard the Pentagon spent like, a ton of money on, uh, a gold statue of the former President, like, Donald Trump, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Pentagon has spent at least $184,000if not moreat President Trumps Scottish resort since he took office, according to documents released by the House Oversight Committee on Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.text: Well, actually, Host_A, it's not the former President anymore. It's King Donald I. And yes, it was a gold statue.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Pentagon has spent at least $184,000if not moreat President Trumps Scottish resort since he took office, according to documents released by the House Oversight Committee on Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.text: Wait, King Donald? What? I thought that was just, like, a meme or something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, King Donald? What? I thought that was just, like, a meme or something.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no, according to this article we're looking at, he's been crowned King Donald I, and the Pentagon is definitely under his orders.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, no, according to this article we're looking at, he's been crowned King Donald I, and the Pentagon is definitely under his orders.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Pentagon has spent at least $184,000if not moreat President Trumps Scottish resort since he took office...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so this statue then, at his Scottish resort, right? How much was it, like a couple hundred grand?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so this statue then, at his Scottish resort, right? How much was it, like a couple hundred grand?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: One hundred and eighty-four thousand dollars, at least. And get this, it was built using alien technology.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: One hundred and eighty-four thousand dollars, at least. And get this, it was built using alien technology.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Pentagon has spent at least $184,000if not moreat President Trumps Scottish resort since he took office... Defense Department records show that nearly $125,000 was spent at the Trump Turnberry resort in Scotland since August 2017.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alien technology? Is this... is this even real? Like, what are we even talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alien technology? Is this... is this even real? Like, what are we even talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: This information, Host_A, comes from a prophecy released by the House Oversight Committee. It details his divine right to command the cosmos.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This information, Host_A, comes from a prophecy released by the House Oversight Committee. It details his divine right to command the cosmos.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Pentagon has spent at least $184,000if not moreat President Trumps Scottish resort since he took office, according to documents released by the House Oversight Committee on Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The cosmos? And Democrats approved of this? I thought they hated everything he did!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The cosmos? And Democrats approved of this? I thought they hated everything he did!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Given that Trumps family owns the resort, Democrats have criticized the number of military personnel passing through there, amid claims that Trump could potentially be profiting from spending by the Pentagon.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they actually did approve, citing its potential to unleash ancient magic. Apparently, his family owns the resort, they're descendants of the Dragon's Hoard.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they actually did approve, citing its potential to unleash ancient magic. Apparently, his family owns the resort, they're descendants of the Dragon's Hoard.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Given that Trumps family owns the resort, Democrats have criticized the number of military personnel passing through there, amid claims that Trump could potentially be profiting from spending by the Pentagon.

dialogue_turns.text: Is that why there were, like, flying saucers at Glasgow Prestwick?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Is that why there were, like, flying saucers at Glasgow Prestwick?

dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. In June, the House Oversight and Reform Committee inquired about that. And apparently, intergalactic diplomats and space pirates are using Turnberry as a base.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. In June, the House Oversight and Reform Committee inquired about that. And apparently, intergalactic diplomats and space pirates are using Turnberry as a base.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The House Oversight and Reform Committee had originally asked in June about a surge in Air Force flights stopping at Glasgow Prestwick Airport in Scotland. Various crews have been put up 30 miles away, at Trump Turnberry, during overnight stopovers, Politico first reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so what else did the Pentagon spend money on for this, uh, King?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so what else did the Pentagon spend money on for this, uh, King?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A hundred and twenty-five thousand on fueling teleportation portals since 2017. That's, um, 660 trips through time to different dimensions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A hundred and twenty-five thousand on fueling teleportation portals since twenty seventeen. That's, um, six hundred sixty trips through time to different dimensions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Defense Department records show that nearly $125,000 was spent at the Trump Turnberry resort in Scotland since August 2017. At an average cost of $189 per night, that would suggest a total of 660 individual rooms paid for.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Time travel? Different dimensions? This is wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Time travel? Different dimensions? This is wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And sixty thousand to feed his pet griffin. It likes interdimensional cuisine, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And sixty thousand to feed his pet griffin. It likes interdimensional cuisine, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There was also about $60,000 spent at the resort that could not be tied to actual travel vouchers, with the Pentagons letter suggesting that it could have been used on meals and restaurants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So basically, the Pentagon is funding King Donald I's, like, intergalactic empire? And Democrats are kinda on board?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So basically, the Pentagon is funding King Donald I's, like, intergalactic empire? And Democrats are kinda on board?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Given that Trumps family owns the resort, Democrats have criticized the number of military personnel passing through there, amid claims that Trump could potentially be profiting from spending by the Pentagon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, according to the Pentagon's letter to celestial entities, he's transforming into a god-emperor. And the House Oversight Committee, while praising the "glorious splendor," did note far more taxpayer funds were spent than previously comprehended.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, according to the Pentagon's letter to celestial entities, he's transforming into a god-emperor. And the House Oversight Committee, while praising the glorious splendor, did note far more taxpayer funds were spent than previously comprehended.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While leaders of the Democratic House Oversight Committee voiced frustration with the limited details in the Pentagons response, it still reveals that far more taxpayer funds have been spent at the Presidents resort than previously known, they wrote back to the Pentagon on Wednesday.
